text.text_translated:
The talk was very good. The person talking said many true things.
Think about parents. Parents use social media when they cook. They use it when they wait for the traffic light. Young people see this. So, how can we ask young people to not text when they do homework?
She also said people want to be in many places at the same time. They talk in real life. They also talk online. They change quickly between these.
I see this often. My young daughter and her friends do this. They plan to meet. Then they sit together. They do not talk to each other. Each one talks to different people online.
